item.title: 26 Jun 2025 20:30
item.description: Got an official notification confirming that I was tenured a month ago. Yay! Pleasantly surprised. This doesn’t really mean much, I guess, under the current administration. The recent RIF plans don’t quite bode well for domestic folks and rumor is that overseas positions are up next. Should have more clarity over the next few days. All I need though is just a few more weeks to clock in those three years and get the whole benefit of the TSP. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: Got an official notification confirming that I was tenured a month ago. Yay! Pleasantly surprised. This doesn’t really mean much, I guess, under the current administration. The recent RIF plans don’t quite bode well for domestic folks and rumor is that overseas positions are up next. Should have more clarity over the next few days. All I need though is just a few more weeks to clock in those three years and get the whole benefit of the TSP. ðŸ”—
